kpi_info.title: Average basic services activated
kpi_info.use: Information about the average amount of basic services used by subscribers.
kpi_info.use_experience:
Use basic service codes as an object to find out activation amounts per basic service.
This KPI is similar to msc_686a. New KPI ID reference.
This new KPI ID reference is to to be used starting from M15.1 report sets.

RECOMMENDED SUMMARY LEVELS: BSERVICE

KPI CLASS: Subscriber
MEASUREMENT(S): HLR measurement, part one (M83)
